EmailTemplate.name: 201908_BK_Webinar_Engine_Monitoring_MC.201908_BK_Email2_Webinar_Engine_Monitorin
EmailTemplate.subject: REMINDER: Engine Monitoring Tips for Efficiency and Preventive Maintenance Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]>
<[[http://www.socialflight.com/#reg]]>WEBINAREngine Monitoring Tips for Efficiency and Preventive Maintenance Webinar
<[[http://www.socialflight.com/#reg]]> Date: Tuesday, August 27th, 8 p.m. EDT Have you registered yet? Don’t miss this Tuesday’s webinar to learn tips and tricks about cylinder temp management, Lean of Peak (LOP) operations, data customization, calibration and fuel management with our AeroPoint product line! Join BendixKing Product Marketing Manager and avid pilot, Steven Pearce, along with SocialFlight President, Jeff Simon, an A&P/IA mechanic, as they discuss how engine monitoring can be a key diagnostic tool to help spot trends and issues before they escalate to safety of flight issues. Topics Include:
- Review of the BendixKing line of Engine Monitors - Installation considerations - Customization and Tips - Operational overview - Data Analysis
Produced in association with SocialFlight.com <[[http://www.socialflight.com/search.php]]>, your webinar registration includes FREE access to information on over 10,000 aviation events, destinations, airport restaurants, contests and more listed on SocialFlight.com, the SocialFlight mobile apps and Local Aviation Event Planner.
REGISTER HERE <[[https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/2019996775141709324]]>
